data.question: What is the empirical formula of JLU-Liu1?
What is the role of 4-PmBC in the structure of JLU-Liu1?
data.answer: 4-PmBC acts as a ligand that coordinates with three copper clusters, serving as a 3-connected node in the structure.

data.question: Is the space group of JLU-Liu1 chiral?
What is the synthesis temperature for JLU-Liu1?
How does the CO2 adsorption capacity of JLU-Liu1 at 298 K compare to its N2 and CH4 adsorption capacities?
data.answer: JLU-Liu1 exhibits highly selective CO2 uptake over N2 and CH4, with a CO2 adsorption capacity of 34.7 cm3 g-1 at 298 K, while it almost cannot adsorb N2 and scarcely adsorbs CH4.

data.question: Does JLU-Liu1 have a higher Qst for CO2 adsorption compared to most MOFs?
What is the crystal system of JLU-Liu1?
What method was used for the synthesis of JLU-Liu1?
Is the total solvent-accessible volume of JLU-Liu1 more than 50% of its cell volume?
What is the yield percentage of JLU-Liu1 based on CuSO4Â·5H2O?
What is the significance of the unique octa-nuclear copper cluster in JLU-Liu1?
data.answer: The unique octa-nuclear copper cluster serves as a secondary building unit (SBU) that, along with the 4-PmBC ligands, forms the 3,6-connected network with ant topology, contributing to its selective gas adsorption properties.

data.question: Is JLU-Liu1 stable up to 300 1C?
What gases were used in the adsorption experiments for JLU-Liu1?
How does the structure of JLU-Liu1 contribute to its CO2 adsorption properties?
data.answer: The structure of JLU-Liu1, featuring 1D channels with uncoordinated oxygen atoms of the sulfate ion along the inner wall, allows for selective CO2 adsorption due to size exclusion and host-guest interactions.

data.question: Does JLU-Liu1 exhibit a higher CO2 adsorption capacity at lower temperatures?
What is the space group of JLU-Liu1?
What is the role of DMF in the synthesis of JLU-Liu1?
data.answer: DMF acts as a solvent in the solvothermal reaction for the synthesis of JLU-Liu1.

data.question: Is the CO2:CH4 selectivity of JLU-Liu1 less than 50?
What is the calculated BET surface area of JLU-Liu1 based on CO2 adsorption isotherms at 273 K?
What factors contribute to the high selective adsorption of CO2 over N2 and CH4 in JLU-Liu1?
data.answer: The high selective adsorption of CO2 over N2 and CH4 in JLU-Liu1 is attributed to a cooperative effect of size exclusion and different host-guest interactions.
